system.availability:
Melee Attacks suffer -5 to Weapon Skill Tests unless they are Immune to Fear, Beasts, Mechnical Constructs.
Wearer gains +10 to Intimidation Tests but suffers -10 to Steath Tests.
system.cost: Often used by Chaos, Consists of Ornate Banners and/or the skulls and helmets of vanquished enemies.
